text: Rob Kardashian and Blac Chyna have reached a private agreement over custody of their 10 - month - old daughter Dream Kardashian, while the Lashed salon owner will no longer pursue a domestic violence case against her ex... for now. The two had split earlier this year after a one - year relationship. In July, Rob posted on Instagram a slew of naked pics of Chyna and a video of her kissing another man, which he said she sent him. He accused her of cheating, belittled her and threatened that she would never see their daughter again unless she stopped ` ` the alcohol and drugs and cocaine and X and E.'' Chyna responded on Snapchat by claiming Rob had ` ` beat'' her and obtained a temporary domestic violence restrain
